RuleSet.Name: src/schema/jpa/SchemaJpaTableTable.java

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaJpaTableTableJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.jpa

RuleSet.GenRule: $reference RetTable DefSchemaName$$reference RetTable Name$ $leadlower Name$( I$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj$iterate Params( each implJpaServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implJpaReadTableDerivedByIndexes$$iterate Index( each implJpaReadTableDerivedByNonPrimaryIndex )$
$reference Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex Suffix$
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implJpaReadTableRecByIndexes$$iterate Index( each implJpaReadTableRecByNonPrimaryIndex )$
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implJpaPageTableRecByIndexes$$iterate Index( each implJpaPageTableRecByNonPrimaryIndex )$
$iterate Index( each implJpaDeleteTableByNonPrimaryIndex empty empty )$$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implJpaDeleteTableByInheritedIndexes$
